kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-08-20 21:27:01 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-20 21:27:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-08-20 21:27:01 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-20 21:27:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-08-20 21:27:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-08-20 21:27:03 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-A47220E511EF->119f9bc4-8e7f-469a-af25-ce4c3a6e1314: receive RaftClientReply:client-A47220E511EF->119f9bc4-8e7f-469a-af25-ce4c3a6e1314@group-F7DF1BB95FB1, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=1, commits[119f9bc4-8e7f-469a-af25-ce4c3a6e1314:c1] 2019-08-20 21:27:03 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-A47220E511EF->119f9bc4-8e7f-469a-af25-ce4c3a6e1314: receive RaftClientReply:client-A47220E511EF->119f9bc4-8e7f-469a-af25-ce4c3a6e1314@group-F7DF1BB95FB1, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=3, commits[119f9bc4-8e7f-469a-af25-ce4c3a6e1314:c4]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

Run And Return Rc And Output

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
